amendatorysection.para: Trucks, truck-tractors, trailers, or buses, from a jurisdiction other than Nebraska, entering Nebraska shall be required to comply with all the laws and regulations of any nature imposed on Nebraska trucks, truck-tractors, trailers, or buses unless the jurisdiction in which such trucks, truck-tractors, trailers, or buses are domiciled grants reciprocity comparable to that extended by the laws of Nebraska.

annotation.para: Reciprocity with other states on licensing of truck-tractors and trailers is provided under specified conditions. Ashton v. State, 173 Neb. 78, 112 N.W.2d 540 (1961).
